legend_0120_friend_01:
[VAR BD06(0000)]All right! You ready for a battle,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)]?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_02:
You come up to me just to tell me no? C’mon,
little bud—don’t mess with me like that![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_03: Excellent! You’re ready too, right, Mabosstiff?![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_select_02: Wait, are you sure about this?!
legend_0120_friend_06: OK, yeah, I can see why you’d be worried...[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_07:
But my buddy here’s bursting with energy! You’d
never know he was so weak just a little while ago![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_08:
Won’t leave me alone—always whining at me,
wanting to battle you and your Pokémon.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_09:
It’s been so long I nearly forgot, but he always
did love to battle.\c
Even if we always lost to that student council
girl—the battle fanatic one.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_10: Anyway, my point is there’s no need to worry![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_11:
We’re a brand-new Arven and Mabosstiff! And
we’re feeling audacious—or maybe herbaceous?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_12: Let me give you a taste of what we can do![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_13:
Dang... This is the strength of someone who
could take down those Titan Pokémon, huh?[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_14:
Yeah, much as I hate to admit it...I do think we’re
gonna need some more support.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_15:
The Pokémon in Area Zero are super strong, and
there are all sorts of weird machines there, too.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_16:
I’d say we need at least two more people...
Somebody with some [VAR COLOR(0006)]Champion Rank–level skills[VAR COLOR(0000)]\r
and somebody who can [VAR COLOR(0006)]deal with crazy tech[VAR COLOR(0000)].[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_16a:
The student council president?\c
You’re probably right. That girl can take on any
Pokémon that comes at her. She’s a beast![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_16b:
Penny? That crazy-smart hacker girl who was
the big boss behind Team Star?\c
I mean, yeah, she’d be perfect for the job...
But when did you go making friends with some\r
shady character like her?![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_16c:
The student council girl?\c
Yeah, she’d be perfect for the job, but I doubt
she’d give us the time of day unless one of us\r
was on her level. As in Champion Rank level.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_16d:
Huh? Never knew we had someone all tech savvy
like that at school.\c
But I doubt someone with those skills would
bother helping us out unless she owed us...\r
or at least liked us.[VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_17a:
But, well, we’ve gotta do what we’ve gotta do!\c
Whoever you think could be a help, just try
getting in good with ’em![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_18a:
We’ll see if we can’t get a team together. Get in
touch if you make progress—I’ll do the same![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_17b:
Huh! Well, seems like you’ve been busy making
some pretty useful friends![VAR 0114(0006)]
legend_0120_friend_18b:
I’ll reach out to them and organize things. You
just make sure you’re there.\c
The meeting place will be the Zero Gate. It’s this
facility out on the edge of the Great Crater.\c
I’ll send you the info on how to find it, so don’t
keep us waiting forever![VAR 0114(0006)]
